title: 1bbot
author: 1bbot
content: Good day Google play linkUseful for Solana staking users (lock/unlock coins)The Solana Widget provides real-time information about Solana cryptocurrency. It displays the following data:Time Remaining: Shows the remaining time for the current epoch. It indicates how much time is left until the next epoch update.Progress Percentage: Displays the progress percentage of the current epoch. It indicates the completion level of the ongoing epoch.Solana Price: Shows the current price of Solana cryptocurrency. It provides the latest price information.Usage: Place the Solana Widget on your device's home screen or any other widget-supported screen. It will continuously update and provide you with real-time information about Solana cryptocurrency.Stay updated with the latest information and keep track of Solana's performance with the Solana Widget on your Android device.Note: This widget requires an active internet connection to fetch and display real-time data.
